mapper.select: select count(*) from tbl_goods where category = #{category}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_reply (gdsNum, userId, repCon) values (#{gdsNum}, #{userId}, #{repCon})
insert into tbl_cart (userId, gdsNum, cartStock, addDate) values (#{userId}, #{gdsNum}, #{cartStock}, now())
mapper.select: select @rownum := @rownum + 1 as num, c.cartNum, c.userId, c.gdsNum, c.cartStock, c.addDate, g.gdsName, g.gdsPrice, g.gdsImg from tbl_cart c inner join tbl_goods g on c.gdsNum = g.gdsNum , (select @rownum := 0) as R where c.userId = #{userId}
mapper.delete: delete from tbl_cart where cartNum = #{cartNum} and userId = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_order(orderId, userId, orderRec, userAddr1, userAddr2, postcode, orderPhon, amount, orderDate) values(#{orderId}, #{userId}, #{orderRec}, #{userAddr1}, #{userAddr2}, #{postcode}, #{orderPhon}, #{amount}, now())
insert into tbl_order_details(orderId, gdsNum, cartStock) select #{orderId}, gdsNum, cartStock from tbl_cart
mapper.select: select orderId, userId, orderRec, userAddr1, userAddr2, postcode, orderPhon, amount, orderDate, delivery from tbl_order

select o.orderId, o.userId, o.orderRec, o.postcode, o.userAddr1, o.userAddr2, o.orderPhon, o.amount, o.orderDate, o.delivery, d.orderDetailsNum, d.gdsNum, d.cartStock, g.gdsName, g.gdsImg, g.gdsPrice from tbl_order o inner join tbl_order_details d on o.orderId = d.orderId inner join tbl_goods g on d.gdsNum = g.gdsNum where o.userId = #{userId} and o.orderId = #{orderId}
